sentence:

A: I called 911.
B: I hailed a cab.

label: B
sentence:

A: It was badly bruised.
B: It was severely infected.

A: He wanted to maintain his privacy.
B: He supported the cause behind his donation.

A: He wanted to relax.

A: The ball rolled across the ground.
B: The ball hit the ceiling.
